definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
erhua variant of 一大早[yi1 da4 zao3]

sentences.english: The next morning, he asks the monks what the sound was, but they say, "We can't tell you."
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，男子就問和尚，那聲音是啥呀。

sentences.english: To support the children, Granny gets up early every day to work on her farm.
sentences.chinese: 爲了扶養孫兒，阿嬤每天一大早起牀到農場工作。

sentences.english: That morning, he woke up early and sat in meditation as usual.
sentences.chinese: 一大早起來，還是一樣打坐，照常做修行的課程。

sentences.english: The next morning Alen insisted on driving me to the car shop.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，Alen堅持要送我去取車。

sentences.english: On the second day in early morning, three madams accompany square the madam come to give too madam to send greeting.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，三夫人陪着方夫人來給太夫人請安。

sentences.english: They rode out to the mountains early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他們一大早就騎馬進山了。

sentences.english: An early morning alarm gets my daughter, Morgan, up for summer school.
sentences.chinese: 一大早鬧鐘鈴響就鬧醒女兒茉苷去上暑期學校。

sentences.english: Today we met at the bus stop early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 今日一大早，咱們相約在車站晤面。

sentences.english: I take a stroll in the early morning every day.
sentences.chinese: 我每天一大早進來閒步。

sentences.english: We'll meet him at the harbour early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 明天一大早我們將在碼頭爲他餞行。

sentences.english: Early morning - protesters plan to bang on the doors of delegates’ hotels
sentences.chinese: 一大早，示威者們計劃猛敲代表們就住的酒店的門。

sentences.english: Xiaoli promised that he would see docter in the early morning next day.
sentences.chinese: 小李答應第二天一大早就去看病。

sentences.english: She got up early this morning so as to catch up the 1st bus.
sentences.chinese: 爲了趕上首班公交車，她一大早就起牀了。

sentences.english: Ming, Seventh Uncle's son, got up early to take us to the bus station.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，曉明帶我們去車站。

sentences.english: He checked out from the hotel early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他一大早就結了賬離開了旅館。

sentences.english: I apologize for calling you this early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱愧這麼一大早就打電話給你。

definition: first thing in the morning/at daybreak
erhua variant of 一大早[yi1 da4 zao3]
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
